snippet: Sony Pictures Classics said it will release Mr. Allen's new movie, about "the final stages of an acute crisis and a life of a fashionable New York housewife," which features Alec Baldwin, Cate Blanchett, Bobby Cannavale and Louis C. K.
abstract: Sony Pictures Classics said it will release Mr. Allen's new movie, about "the final stages of an acute crisis and a life of a fashionable New York housewife," which features Alec Baldwin, Cate Blanchett, Bobby Cannavale and Louis C. K.

headline.main: Woody Allen Names His New Movie 'Blue Jasmine'
headline.print_headline: New Woody Allen Movie Is Named ‘Blue Jasmine’
